LZW

Class LZWDecompression

  • java.lang.Object
    • LZW.LZWDecompression

  • public class LZWDecompression
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that decompresses the file with LZW algorithm.

      • run

        public void run(java.lang.String originalFile)
         throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                java.io.IOException
        The main method of LZWDecompression. Starts all other methods needed for data decompression.
        Parameters:
        originalFile - String, the original file which will be decompressed.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException

      • decompress

        public void decompress(java.io.FileOutputStream fos,
                       HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> dictionary,
                       ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> codes)
                throws java.io.IOException
        The main method of decompressing LZW algorithm. Decompresses the codes and uses writeFile method to write output file.
        Parameters:
        fos - FileOutputStream, used for output.
        dictionary - HashMap, used for decompressing the file.
        codes - ArrayList, used for decompressing the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • readFile

        public ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> readFile(java.io.FileInputStream fis)
                                      throws java.io.IOException
        Reads chars from input stream and converts them to integer codes which get added into list for decompressing.
        Parameters:
        fis - FileInputStream, the input stream used for reading the compressed data.
        Returns:
        codes ArrayList, used for decompressing the file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
